explains: n. 倒叙；闪回；迷幻药效幻觉重现

sentences.en: The reader is told the story in flashback.
sentences.cn: 故事是以倒叙手法向读者讲述的。

sentences.en: There is even a flashback to the murder itself.
sentences.cn: 甚至有一个谋杀本身的闪回镜头。

sentences.en: Flashback 29 years ago, pretend you are still studying at a business school.
sentences.cn: 回首29年前，假装你还坐在商学院念书。
